TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowItemPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl implements class System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView
Public NotInheritable Class WorkflowItemPresenter Inherits ContentControl Implements ICompositeView

summary.span: 提供編輯 物件的視覺化編輯器，並提供讓使用者拖放或編輯構成項目的區域。

span.span: Provides a visual editor to edit objects, and provides an area for the user to drag and drop, and otherwise edit composed elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 控制項，它做為編輯容器以顯示視覺效果的資料在繫結至屬性。This is a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) control that acts as an editing container that displays the visualization for the data it is bound to in the property. 是兩種控制項中的其中一種 (另一種是 )，可用於建立視覺化及編輯構成項目的容器。The is one of two controls (the other being ) that can be used to create a container for visualizing and editing a composed element. 請注意，構成項目的視覺化並非由 控制，但它會使用與中繼資料存放區中相關聯的視覺化來呈現指定型別。It is important to note that the visualization of the composed element is not controlled by the but it renders with the visualization associated in the metadata store for a given type. 是特定的子類別的 WPF ，已修改成支援拖曳和卸除、 複製及貼上、 以及其他視覺編輯動作。The is a specialized subclass of the WPF that has been modified to support drag and drop, copy and paste, and other visual editing actions. ## Examples 此控制項主要是用於活動設計工具，如以下的範例程式碼所示。The primary use of this control will be in an activity designer, as seen in the sample code below. 以下的 XAML 會顯示建立 If 活動簡易設計工具之控制項的宣告式用法。The XAML below shows the declarative usage of the control to build a simple designer for the If activity. If 活動有兩種型別屬性：Activity 與 Then and Else，且每個 WorkflowItemPresenter 的項目都連結至其個別屬性。The If activity has two properties of type Activity, Then and Else, and the Item for each WorkflowItemPresenter is linked to that respective property. 如需在使用中，請參閱[自訂複合設計工具-工作流程項目展示器](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-item-presenter.md)範例。For an example of the in use, see the [Custom Composite Designers - Workflow Item Presenter](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-item-presenter.md) sample. ```xaml ```
